answers.answer: What is a long time?Fluctuate... how much 90 to 100 or 40 to 400?it is hard to tell if your diabetic or well controlled, however if your on meds and still have BG over 140 your diabetic.DiabeticANY BG over 200A1c  over 6.9   (this number very's depending on who's threshold you use)Pre-diabetes is A1c over 6

Take a A1c test - this will test your blood sugar for the past 2 or 3 months.  My doctor sends me to the lab to get the A1c test, but I periodically perform the test at home.  I buy it at Walmart - it cost me about $30.00 and is good for 2 tests.Hope this helps.

question: Hi I am on diabetic medication,But Have been for a very Long time,now my doctor wants to test me again to see if I really am a Type 2 diabetic, I check my sugars often, and they do fluxuate up and down But they are in normal range most of the time, how do i know if I really am and is there a test that you can Buy at the pharmacy to see if I am
title: dont know
